column4: hi! If I use clonecd in linux/vmware will it operate just like it does in windows?
clonecd in vmware/wine, same support as in windows?
is there a way to burn dual layers dvd+r in linux?
it should be the same as burning any other dvd/d
i'm afraid not, I need to have the burner app/frontend to put my burner into bitsetting - dvdrom mode and dual layer modes
clonecd does this on auto, but i'm wondering if I run clonecd with wine/vmware, will it be the same thing?
ah.. I've never done dual layer burning myself, so I'm not entirely sure.. I just assumed it was the same.
I'll check it out, just a quickie, If I run clonecd in wine/wmare will it be the same thing?
I don't think VMware supports cd/dvd burning
